name: floristic
content:
Add to word list

relating to plants and where they grow: The floristic composition was analyzed, and the total percentage of plant coverage was estimated. The ungrazed vegetation was less susceptible to erosion, and floristic diversity increased considerably.
More examplesFewer examplesForest fires affected the forests of the Mediterranean floristic region last summer.Rainforest covers 90% of the country and is considered important in terms of floristic diversity.Floristic research requires access to databases and geographic information systems.There are several collaborative floristic projects in this area.
